climbs.name: Regular Route
climbs.fa: Bill Amborn, Joe McKeown and Dave McFadden 11/1960

content.description:
The hardest move is right at the start where you surmount a small overlap and getting established on the slab above.  Romp to the top with a smile on your face because this rock is pretty darn good for the Pinnacles!

Descend by rappelling 85' from the anchor this shares with Rightfoot.
content.protection: Three bolts to a two-bolt anchor with chains for rappel.
content.location: This is the leftmost route on the formation.

content.description: No real crux, just fun climbing on pretty good rock up a nice face.  It's a little far to the first bolt, you might want a spotter.  Descend by rappelling 85' from the anchor chains.
content.protection: Four bolts to a two-bolt anchor with chains shared with the Regular Route.
content.location: This is the second route from the left side of the formation.
